    [Serializable]
    readonly partial struct MyEither : IEquatable<MyEither>, ISerializable
    {
        private readonly byte _idx;
        private readonly string? _v1;
        private readonly int _v2;
        private readonly int? _v3;

        public MyEither()
        {
            _idx = 0;
            _v1 = default!;
            _v2 = default;
            _v3 = default;
        }

        public MyEither(string value)
        {
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(value);
            _idx = 1;
            _v1 = value;
            _v2 = default;
            _v3 = default;
        }

        public MyEither(int value)
        {
            _idx = 2;
            _v1 = default!;
            _v2 = value;
            _v3 = default;
        }

        public MyEither(int? value)
        {
            _idx = 3;
            _v1 = default!;
            _v2 = default;
            _v3 = value;
        }

        private MyEither(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context)
        {
            _idx = info.GetByte(nameof(_idx));
            switch (_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    _v1 = (string?)info.GetValue("_v1", typeof(string));
                    _v2 = default;
                    _v3 = default;
                    break;
                case 2:
                    _v1 = default!;
                    _v2 = (int)info.GetValue("_v2", typeof(int))!;
                    _v3 = default;
                    break;
                case 3:
                    _v1 = default!;
                    _v2 = default;
                    _v3 = (int?)info.GetValue("_v3", typeof(int?));
                    break;
                default:
                    _v1 = default!;
                    _v2 = default;
                    _v3 = default;
                    ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState();
                    break;
            }
        }

        [Pure]
        public object? Case
        {
            get
            {
                switch (_idx)
                {
                    case 1:
                        return _v1;
                    case 2:
                        return _v2;
                    case 3:
                        return _v3;
                    default:
                        return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<object?>();
                }
            }
        }

        [Pure]
        public static bool operator ==(MyEither left, MyEither right) => left.Equals(right);

        [Pure]
        public static bool operator !=(MyEither left, MyEither right) => !left.Equals(right);

        [Pure]
        public static implicit operator MyEither(string value) => new(value);

        [Pure]
        public static implicit operator MyEither(int value) => new(value);

        [Pure]
        public static implicit operator MyEither(int? value) => new(value);

        [Pure]
        public override int GetHashCode()
        {
            switch (_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return _v1!.GetHashCode();
                case 2:
                    return _v2.GetHashCode();
                case 3:
                    return _v3?.GetHashCode() ?? 0;
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<int>();
            }
        }

        [Pure]
        public override string ToString()
        {
            switch (_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return _v1!.ToString() ?? string.Empty;
                case 2:
                    return _v2.ToString() ?? string.Empty;
                case 3:
                    return _v3?.ToString() ?? string.Empty;
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<string>();
            }
        }

        [Pure]
        public override bool Equals(object? obj)
        {
            if (obj is not MyEither other)
            {
                return false;
            }

            return Equals(other);
        }

        [Pure]
        public bool Equals(MyEither other)
        {
            if (_idx != other._idx)
            {
                return false;
            }

            switch (_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return _v1!.Equals(other._v1);
                case 2:
                    return _v2.Equals(other._v2);
                case 3:
                    return _v3?.Equals(other._v3) ?? false;
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<bool>();
            }
        }

        void ISerializable.GetObjectData(SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context)
        {
            info.AddValue("_idx", _idx);
            switch (_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    info.AddValue("_v1", _v1);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    info.AddValue("_v2", _v2);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    info.AddValue("_v3", _v3);
                    break;
                default:
                    ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState();
                    break;
            }
        }

        [Pure]
        public bool TryPick([NotNullWhen(true)] out string? value)
        {
            if (_idx == 1)
            {
                value = _v1!;
                return true;
            }

            value = default!;
            return false;
        }

        [Pure]
        public bool TryPick(out int value)
        {
            if (_idx == 2)
            {
                value = _v2;
                return true;
            }

            value = default;
            return false;
        }

        [Pure]
        public bool TryPick(out int? value)
        {
            if (_idx == 3)
            {
                value = _v3;
                return true;
            }

            value = default;
            return false;
        }

        public TResult Match<TResult>(
            Func<string, TResult> f1,
            Func<int, TResult> f2,
            Func<int?, TResult> f3)
        {
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f1);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f2);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f3);

            switch(_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return f1(_v1!);
                case 2:
                    return f2(_v2);
                case 3:
                    return f3(_v3);
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<TResult>();
            }
        }

        public TResult Match<TState, TResult>(
            TState state,
            Func<TState, string, TResult> f1,
            Func<TState, int, TResult> f2,
            Func<TState, int?, TResult> f3)
        {
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f1);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f2);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f3);

            switch(_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return f1(state, _v1!);
                case 2:
                    return f2(state, _v2);
                case 3:
                    return f3(state, _v3);
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<TResult>();
            }
        }

        public Task<TResult> MatchAsync<TResult>(
            Func<string, CancellationToken, Task<TResult>> f1,
            Func<int, CancellationToken, Task<TResult>> f2,
            Func<int?, CancellationToken, Task<TResult>> f3,
            CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f1);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f2);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f3);

            switch(_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return f1(_v1!, cancellationToken);
                case 2:
                    return f2(_v2, cancellationToken);
                case 3:
                    return f3(_v3, cancellationToken);
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<Task<TResult>>();
            }
        }

        public Task<TResult> MatchAsync<TState, TResult>(
            TState state,
            Func<TState, string, CancellationToken, Task<TResult>> f1,
            Func<TState, int, CancellationToken, Task<TResult>> f2,
            Func<TState, int?, CancellationToken, Task<TResult>> f3,
            CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f1);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f2);
            ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(f3);

            switch(_idx)
            {
                case 1:
                    return f1(state, _v1!, cancellationToken);
                case 2:
                    return f2(state, _v2, cancellationToken);
                case 3:
                    return f3(state, _v3, cancellationToken);
                default:
                    return ThrowHelper.ThrowOnInvalidState<Task<TResult>>();
            }
        }

        public void Switch(
            Action<string> a1,
            Action<int> a2,
            Action<int?> a3)
        {
            Match(
                v => { a1(v); return Unit.Default; },
                v => { a2(v); return Unit.Default; },
                v => { a3(v); return Unit.Default; });
        }

        public void Switch<TState>(
            TState state,
            Action<TState, string> a1,
            Action<TState, int> a2,
            Action<TState, int?> a3)
        {
            Match(
                state,
                (s, v) => { a1(s, v); return Unit.Default; },
                (s, v) => { a2(s, v); return Unit.Default; },
                (s, v) => { a3(s, v); return Unit.Default; });
        }

        public Task SwitchAsync(
            Func<string, CancellationToken, Task> a1,
            Func<int, CancellationToken, Task> a2,
            Func<int?, CancellationToken, Task> a3,
            CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            return MatchAsync(
                async (v, ct) => { await a1(v, ct); return Unit.Default; },
                async (v, ct) => { await a2(v, ct); return Unit.Default; },
                async (v, ct) => { await a3(v, ct); return Unit.Default; },
                cancellationToken);
        }

        public Task SwitchAsync<TState>(
            TState state,
            Func<TState, string, CancellationToken, Task> a1,
            Func<TState, int, CancellationToken, Task> a2,
            Func<TState, int?, CancellationToken, Task> a3,
            CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            return MatchAsync(
                state,
                async (s, v, ct) => { await a1(s, v, ct); return Unit.Default; },
                async (s, v, ct) => { await a2(s, v, ct); return Unit.Default; },
                async (s, v, ct) => { await a3(s, v, ct); return Unit.Default; },
                cancellationToken);
        }
    }
